snippet.title: Tactical Squad: SWAT Stories Devlog – Episode 1
snippet.description:
Here's episode 1 of the devlog for Tactical Squad: SWAT Stories, a tactical team game for PC Steam developed in a collaboration between Ritual Interactive and Red Mountain Games.
Add the game to your wishlist on Steam and follow it to support our project!
→ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1619310/Tactical_Squad__SWAT_Stories/ ←

We also have an official Tactical Squad Discord server! There is a contest with an awesome prize in progress, where you can submit your own idea for a mission to be featured in the final game!
→ https://discord.gg/DQepwC6CcN ←
So come on over and join our community today!

Stay tuned for more development updates and news about the game's demo released later this year. Follow us on our media for future updates:
Red Mountain Games Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RedMountainGame/
Red Mountain Games Twitter: https://twitter.com/redmountaingame
Ritual Interactive Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Ritual.Int/
Ritual Interactive Twitter: https://twitter.com/Ritual_Int

Timestamps:
01 – Intro – 00:00
02 – Tactical Squad: SWAT Stories Trailer – 00:18
03 – Game overview – 00:33
04 – Game world details – 01:50
05 – Mission progression preview – 02:10
06 – Complex level design – 06:04
07 – Weapon customization – 06:40
08 – Game settings & Outro – 07:37

Music used in the video created by Avery Alexander: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUCQAFyjDmGSK68SfQ3iBVQ

#tacticalsquad #fps #indiegames #shooter #tactical #devlog #gamedev #ritualinteractive #redmountaingames
